title: 04/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin puts a group of NFL quarterbacks under the spotlight and labels them the “Pressure Club” entering the 2021 season. He has no issue with Trevor Lawrence’s comments about life without football and why he can still be a great quarterback in the NFL. He casts doubt on the championship hopes of 1 NBA team after noticing something in a narrow loss last night. Plus, LaVar Arrington joins the show to tell Colin how much of an impact Jadeveon Clowney will have on the Browns and their Super Bowl chances.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
